(?Prize for Understanding and Tolerance?) at the Jewish Museum in Berlin, Germany, 15 November 2008. Kertesz and company consultant Berger were jointly awarded the prize. data.text:
Nobel Prize for Literature laureate Imre Kertesz gives a speech after receiving the ?Preis fuer Verstaendigung und Toleranz? (?Prize for Understanding and Tolerance?) at the Jewish Museum in Berlin, Germany, 15 November 2008. Kertesz and company consultant Berger were jointly awarded the prize. Photo: Marcel Mettelsiefen

Captions are provided by our contributors.
